aboutMe: CTF, web development, and cybersecurity are my passions. I focus on safe internet apps and complex cybersecurity concerns. I follow web development and cybersecurity. I adore leveraging my programming and problem-solving talents to create secure, innovative user-focused solutions. I've programmed in web languages like Next.js and enjoy the challenge of secure code to build powerful apps. Beyond programming, I compete in CTFs to understand and defend against real-world security threats. And I adore how technology makes the digital world safer and more efficient.
